tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE temperature_data (
    time TIMESTAMP,
    location VARCHAR,
    temperature FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE temperature_stats (
  stats_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  temperature_id INT,
  avg_temperature FLOAT,
  max_temperature FLOAT,
  min_temperature FLOAT,
  FOREIGN KEY (temperature_id) REFERENCES temperature_data(temperature_id)
);

CREATE TABLE temperature_stats (
    stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature_id INT,
    min_temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    max_temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    average_temperature DECIMAL(5,2),
    FOREIGN KEY (temperature_id) REFERENCES temperature_data(temperature_id)
);

CREATE TABLE temperature_alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    temperature_id INT,
    alert_message TEXT,
    alert_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (temperature_id) REFERENCES temperature_data(temperature_id)
);
